```{r}
here::i_am("r-101-grade-analysis.Rproj")
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(vroom)
```

```{r}
grades<-vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```
## Question 2

```{r}
grades|>
  summarise(min(`Exam`,na.rm=TRUE),max(`Exam`,na.rm=TRUE),median(`Exam`,na.rm=TRUE),mean(`Exam`,na.rm=TRUE))|>
  knitr::kable()
```


## Question 3
```{r}
nb_stud_exam<-sum(is.na(grades$Exam))
```
There is a total of `r nb_stud_exam` students who passed the test

## Question 4
```{r}
ggplot(grades, aes(x=Exam))+
  geom_histogram(binwidth=2.5,fill="darkblue",color="black",alpha=0.7,na.rm=TRUE)+
  labs(title= "Distribution of Exam grades",
       x="Exam grades",
       y= "Frequency")
```
